00036 #include "ApoptoticCellKiller.hpp"
00037 #include "ApoptoticCellProperty.hpp"
00038 
00039 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00040 ApoptoticCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::ApoptoticCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<SPACE_DIM>* pCellPopulation)
00041     : AbstractCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>(pCellPopulation)
00042 {
00043 }
00044 
00045 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00046 void ApoptoticCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::CheckAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(CellPtr pCell)
00047 {
00048     if (pCell->HasCellProperty<ApoptoticCellProperty>() && !(pCell->HasApoptosisBegun()))
00049     {
00050         pCell->StartApoptosis();
00051     }
00052 }
00053 
00054 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00055 void ApoptoticCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::CheckAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00056 {
00057     for (typename AbstractCellPopulation<SPACE_DIM>::Iterator cell_iter = this->mpCellPopulation->Begin();
00058         cell_iter != this->mpCellPopulation->End();
00059         ++cell_iter)
00060     {
00061         CheckAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(*cell_iter);
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 template<unsigned DIM>
00066 void ApoptoticCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00067 {
00068     // No parameters to output, so just call method on direct parent class
00069     AbstractCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(rParamsFile);
00070 }

00076 template class ApoptoticCellKiller<1>;
00077 template class ApoptoticCellKiller<2>;
00078 template class ApoptoticCellKiller<3>;
